name: Frustration (Older Timer)
description:
Aunt Maud has given you a list of groceries she wants you to get, but your task may not be as easy as you might imagine.

A large text-only adventure written for the PC in qbasic64. It can be run either in Windows or in a DOS window. All files in the zipped folder must be present in the game folder for it to run.

Unlike in my later games it is possible to get yourself into an unwinnable situation.
